summary: Love it! absolutely astOUNDING. Nice work, dude!

description:
Nothing more than an exporter of text to a image.
Currently all it does is export text into some "handwriting" styled fonts, and provides a graphical exporter to an image. It does have options to add some interesting "paper page" elements, but nothing that I would say translates it to "handwriting". Every character repeats the same, it clearly looks like a wordprocessed file.
It is only on version 0.1.0, but it should be considered as nothing more than simple font conversion of a text file. On my gnome inteface I couldn't even drag and drop (as advertised)
I will however, be intrigued to see where this could lead
summary: This has a long way to go
